thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com
thread.title: HELLER, CASEY

author: HELLER, CASEY
title: HELLER, CASEY
text:
Being a little unsure of what I needed for light commercial use, I find the mileage you get from Whole Latte Love customer support depends on who answers the phone. I ended up making my choice after hours of youtube reviews and forum posts and a little assistance from Whole Latte Love.
Ultimately chose the Expobar Office Lever and really couldn't be happier at the price I paid. The product was double boxed, arrived on time and in perfect condition I had no issues getting it up and running.
